item.title: Mind the Math: Innovating at the Speed of Thought
item.description: Welcome to Mind the Math, where innovation meets mathematics. We are a multidisciplinary consulting firm that specializes in connecting the latest research in academia with the practical application of software development. Our goal is to help teams achieve their outcomes more effectively and efficiently by leveraging the power of technology. Michael Pilosov, PhD Mind the Math was founded by Michael Pilosov, a computational mathematician with a unique ability to bring together scientific and creative disciplines in real-world applications.
